title: The Flying doctor
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Broken Hill Proprietary Company and L. Scott-Ehrenberg
brief_description: A dramatised account of the work of the aerial ambulance of the Flying Doctor Service, providing medical facilities for the people of 3,000,000 square miles of the Australian inland. Photography: Harry Malcolm.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Broken Hill Proprietary Company and L. Scott-Ehrenberg
